abstract: Driven column review of Ford Explorer sport utility vehicle.

headline.print_headline: Upgrades Have Ford Explorer Riding High
headline.main: Video Review: With Many Options, Ford Explorer Rides High

snippet: An S.U.V. that offers a dizzying number of choices and the ability to handle more than many drivers will need....
